text: Guevarra E (2024). adlaw: Interface Scaling Nutrition (SUN) Movement Datasets. R package version 0.0.0.9000, https://katilingban.io/scalingupnutrition/, https://katilingban.io/adlaw/, https://github.com/katilingban/adlaw.

what: An Interface to the Scaling Up Nutrition (SUN) Movement Datasets
title: An Interface to the Scaling Up Nutrition (SUN) Movement Datasets
text: Scaling Nutrition (SUN) global movement 60 countries aiming end malnutrition forms. package contains various datasets produced movement functions aid manipulation processing datasets. also includes functions support analysis visualisation datasets. Finally, Shiny application included allow user interactively engage publicly-available SUN Movement datasets.

title: An Interface to the Scaling Up Nutrition (SUN) Movement Datasets
text: package adlaw can installed R GitHub via remotes:
code: if(!require(remotes)) install.packages("remotes") remotes::install_github("katilingban/adlaw")

what: An Interface to the Scaling Up Nutrition (SUN) Movement Datasets — adlaw
title: An Interface to the Scaling Up Nutrition (SUN) Movement Datasets — adlaw
text: Scaling Nutrition (SUN) http://scalingupnutrition.org global movement 60 countries aiming end malnutrition forms. SUN Movement. package contains various datasets produced Movement functions aid manipulation processing datasets. also includes functions support analysis visualisation datasets. Finally, Shiny application included allow user interactively engage publicly-available SUN Movement datasets.

title: An Interface to the Scaling Up Nutrition (SUN) Movement Datasets — adlaw
text: Maintainer: Ernest Guevarra ernest@guevarra.io (ORCID)

title: Produce a tidy dataframe of Scaling Up Nutrition Movement's progress reports from 2011 to 2017 — progress_reports
